title: On the go switching roles (Clash)
body: So i was wandering. What if during the champ select in Clash, the members on the team for whatever reason went on different roles than what they had originally picked. Is that whithin the rules?

replies.body: Clash is still in beta for now, but I would definitely be sure to pop over to the [**Clash Discord**](https://discord.gg/CV5tpb6) and ask the Devs themselves! They're actively discussing everything in that Discord channel for a bit ^_^!
